name: Corovans
description: Recently I found out that a man named Kirill had wanted a game about caravans for two years, and I decided to make it in 2 days. He wrote “I want to rob Corovans”, which is why I called her that.  This is an economic game. You need to constantly trade in order to negotiate with the bandits or die. It’s better not to joke with them! But trade is also unstable here.
